events.name: Devastating Earthquakes Hit Turkiye and Syria
events.wd_label: Devastating Earthquakes Hit Turkiye and Syria
events.wd_description: Two powerful earthquakes struck the border of Turkiye and Syria, causing widespread destruction and a rising death toll of over 12,000 people. The disaster has overwhelmed rescue efforts and led to international support.
events.description: Two powerful earthquakes struck the border of Turkiye and Syria, causing widespread destruction and a rising death toll of over 12,000 people. The disaster has overwhelmed rescue efforts and led to international support.

events.name: Earthquakes on the Turkiye-Syria Border
events.wd_description: Two powerful earthquakes, one with a magnitude of 7.8 and another with a magnitude of 7.5, struck the border of Turkiye and Syria, causing widespread devastation in both countries.
events.description: Two powerful earthquakes, one with a magnitude of 7.8 and another with a magnitude of 7.5, struck the border of Turkiye and Syria, causing widespread devastation in both countries.

events.name: Rising Death Toll and Delayed Rescue Efforts
events.wd_label: Rising Death Toll and Delayed Rescue Efforts
events.wd_description: The death toll from the earthquakes has risen to over 12,000 people, with the number expected to increase as delayed rescue efforts struggle to reach affected areas, leading to criticism from affected communities.
events.description: The death toll from the earthquakes has risen to over 12,000 people, with the number expected to increase as delayed rescue efforts struggle to reach affected areas, leading to criticism from affected communities.

events.name: International Support and Acknowledgment of Disaster
events.wd_label: International Support and Acknowledgment of Disaster
events.wd_description: International support has been sent to Turkiye and Syria as leaders from both countries acknowledged the overwhelming nature of the disaster and the need for external assistance.
events.description: International support has been sent to Turkiye and Syria as leaders from both countries acknowledged the overwhelming nature of the disaster and the need for external assistance.

events.name: Russia Claims Control of Soledar
events.wd_description: Russia's military announced the capture of the salt-mine town of Soledar, considering it an important step for advancing towards Bakhmut, though its strategic significance is debated.
events.description: Russia's military announced the capture of the salt-mine town of Soledar, considering it an important step for advancing towards Bakhmut, though its strategic significance is debated.

events.name: Capture of Soledar
events.wd_description: Russian forces claimed to have captured the town of Soledar after a prolonged battle, marking their first significant victory in Ukraine since July 2022.
events.description: Russian forces claimed to have captured the town of Soledar after a prolonged battle, marking their first significant victory in Ukraine since July 2022.

events.name: Russian Military's Next Steps
events.wd_description: Following the capture of Soledar, Russia aims to advance its troops towards the nearby city of Bakhmut, a key objective in its offensive.
events.description: Following the capture of Soledar, Russia aims to advance its troops towards the nearby city of Bakhmut, a key objective in its offensive.

events.name: Strategic Debate Over Soledar
events.wd_description: Military analysts, including the US-based Institute for the Study of War, questioned the strategic importance of Soledar, suggesting it may not significantly aid Russia's efforts to encircle Bakhmut.
events.description: Military analysts, including the US-based Institute for the Study of War, questioned the strategic importance of Soledar, suggesting it may not significantly aid Russia's efforts to encircle Bakhmut.

events.name: Germany and UK Send Tanks to Ukraine
events.wd_label: Germany and UK Send Tanks to Ukraine
events.wd_description: Germany has sent the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, while the UK has delivered Challenger 2 tanks. The tanks are expected to play a decisive role on the frontlines of the war in Ukraine.
events.description: Germany has sent the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, while the UK has delivered Challenger 2 tanks. The tanks are expected to play a decisive role on the frontlines of the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Delivery of Leopard 2 Tanks
events.wd_description: Germany confirmed the delivery of the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, with German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius expressing confidence in their impact on the battlefield.
events.description: Germany confirmed the delivery of the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, with German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius expressing confidence in their impact on the battlefield.

events.name: UK Challenger 2 Tanks Sent to Ukraine
events.wd_label: UK Challenger 2 Tanks Sent to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The UK also sent its Challenger 2 tanks to Ukraine, marking a significant contribution to Ukraine's military capabilities in the ongoing conflict.
events.description: The UK also sent its Challenger 2 tanks to Ukraine, marking a significant contribution to Ukraine's military capabilities in the ongoing conflict.

events.name: Training and Additional Equipment
events.wd_description: Ukrainian soldiers have been trained in Germany to operate the advanced A6 variant of the Leopard 2 tanks. Ukraine also received two specialist tank-recovery vehicles and 40 Marder infantry fighting vehicles from Germany.
events.description: Ukrainian soldiers have been trained in Germany to operate the advanced A6 variant of the Leopard 2 tanks. Ukraine also received two specialist tank-recovery vehicles and 40 Marder infantry fighting vehicles from Germany.

events.name: Response to critical mineral scarcity in EV battery production
events.wd_label: Response to critical mineral scarcity in EV battery production
events.wd_description: Automakers like Honda are turning to recyclers to address the scarcity and expense of critical minerals such as graphite and lithium. Battery material recyclers and manufacturers are scaling up operations to meet this growing demand.
events.description: Automakers like Honda are turning to recyclers to address the scarcity and expense of critical minerals such as graphite and lithium. Battery material recyclers and manufacturers are scaling up operations to meet this growing demand.

events.name: Ascend Elements facility in Kentucky
events.wd_description: Ascend Elements is building a $1 billion battery materials recycling facility in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, expected to produce enough EV battery material annually to power more than 250,000 electric vehicles.
events.description: Ascend Elements is building a $1 billion battery materials recycling facility in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, expected to produce enough EV battery material annually to power more than 250,000 electric vehicles.

events.name: Redwood Materials facility in South Carolina
events.wd_label: Redwood Materials facility in South Carolina
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials announced a $3.5 billion investment in a new battery materials facility in Charleston, South Carolina.
events.description: Redwood Materials announced a $3.5 billion investment in a new battery materials facility in Charleston, South Carolina.

events.name: GM and Lithion Recycling agreement
events.wd_description: GM signed an agreement with Lithion Recycling to use its advanced battery recycling technology.
events.description: GM signed an agreement with Lithion Recycling to use its advanced battery recycling technology.

events.name: Honda's sustainability efforts
events.wd_description: Honda is pushing for closed-loop battery supply chains to limit wasted critical materials, striving for carbon neutrality by 2050, and aiming for EVs to represent 100% of its vehicle sales in North America by 2040.
events.description: Honda is pushing for closed-loop battery supply chains to limit wasted critical materials, striving for carbon neutrality by 2050, and aiming for EVs to represent 100% of its vehicle sales in North America by 2040.

events.name: Honda's EV battery plant in Ohio
events.wd_label: Honda's EV battery plant in Ohio
events.wd_description: Honda is building an EV battery plant in Ohio as part of its goal to achieve 100% EV sales in North America by 2040.
events.description: Honda is building an EV battery plant in Ohio as part of its goal to achieve 100% EV sales in North America by 2040.
